name: Quick and Easy Fudge Sauce
description: Chocolate fudge sauce for ice cream sundaes is only a few brief steps away with this recipe using ground sweet chocolate and heavy cream. For a grownup treat, add a splash of your favorite liquor or liqueur at the end.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/4 cups (125g) King Arthur Sweet Ground Chocolate
2 teaspoons King Arthur Pure Vanilla Extract
recipeInstructions:
In a medium saucepan set over medium heat, bring the cream, unsweetened chocolate, sugar, espresso powder, and salt to a simmer.
, Stir until the chocolate dissolves, then stir in the sweet ground chocolate.
, Stir over low heat until the sauce is smooth. Remove from the heat and add the vanilla.
, Serve sauce warm over ice cream.
, Refrigerate any leftover sauce, in an airtight container, for up to 10 days.
